post.author: 이진경
post.content:
Bevertec CST is seeking intermediate and senior level SAP consultants for our clients in Ontario and Quebec. Contract and permanent positions available. If you have a minimum of 3 years of technical or functional SAP implementation experience we would like to hear from you. Bilingualism is
required for positions in Quebec. SAP certification preferred.

We are looking for candidates experienced in implementation, customization and integration of the following modules:

FI—Financial
CO—Cost Accounting
SD—Sales and Distribution
MM—Materials Management
PP—Production Planning
ABAP/4—Advanced Business Application Programming
TCC—Technical Consultant Certification
HR—Human Resources
AA—Asset Accounting
CO-PA—Profitability Analysis
CO-PC—Product Costing
PM—Plant Maintenance
PP-PI—Production Planning - Process Industry
PS—Project System
QM—Quality Management
SM—Service Management
WM—Warehouse Management
BW—Business Warehousing
CRM—Customer Relationship Management



Please e-mail resumes to resumes@bevertec.com or fax it to 416-695-7526. Please indicate Ref Code # 800 in all correspondence.


Established in 1981, Bevertec CST Inc. is based in Toronto, Canada, serving clients in Canada, the US, South America, the Caribbean and Asia. We develop and implement innovative software solutions for the Financial Services, Manufacturing, Communications and Transportation sectors, and for Federal, Provincial and Municipal Government Agencies.

Additional Information
Position Type: Full Time, Employee  

Contact Information
resumes@bevertec.com
Bevertec CST
Fax: 416-695-7526
post.title: Intermediate and Senior level SAP consultants
